Content: The suspect who is connected to the incident of shooting a woman to death in Jaela recently, has committed suicide. A suspect has committed suicide by jumping into Jaela Dadugam Oya while being taken to Peliyagoda Police Station from Chilaw. Police said that they stopped the vehicle as the suspect requested several times to stop the vehicle to answer a call of nature. Police said the suspect jumped Dadugam Oya at that moment. They said that he was the main accomplice of the underworld leader Ganemulle Sanjeewa.
